original: dge ba gang dang gang rtsom pa de dang de nyid myur du mthar phyin par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dge ba gang dang gang rtsom pa de dang de nyid myur du mthar phyin par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Whatever virtue one undertakes will not be quickly completed.

original: rab tu byung ba ni de lta ma yin pa dang / khyim pa ni brtul zhugs la nges par gnas pa ma yin pas gzhan dag la tshig mi btsun gyi rab tu byung ba ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni de lta ma yin pa dang / khyim pa ni brtul zhugs la nges par gnas pa ma yin pas gzhan dag la tshig mi btsun gyi rab tu byung ba ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: But it is not so for one who has gone forth, and a lay person is not definitely established in spiritual deportment, so one’s words are not respected by others. But it is not so for one who has gone forth.

original: rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad kyis khyim pa las shin tu khyad ches khyad par du 'phags par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad kyis khyim pa las shin tu khyad ches khyad par du 'phags par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that one who has gone forth is far superior to a lay person in all the qualities that accord with such statements.

original: de ltar gnas skabs de lta bu dag nas rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bas bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la legs par shin tu bslab par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs de lta bu dag nas rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bas bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la legs par shin tu bslab par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, from such states, one should apply oneself uninterruptedly to virtue and train well and thoroughly in those six bases of training.

original: legs par shin tu bslab pa la mkhas pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: legs par shin tu bslab pa la mkhas pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: The meaning of the words “skill in training well and thoroughly” has been explained.
